hypotheses.hypothesis: The recent ROAS decline is due to increased competition; increasing bids by 10% will restore ROAS to previous levels.
supporting_signals: General ROAS decline mentioned in the summary

hypotheses.hypothesis: Replacing the visual for the "Breathable microfiber that moves with you — limited offer on women sports bras." creative with one featuring customer testimonials will increase ROAS above 3.
supporting_signals: "Breathable microfiber that moves with you — limited offer on women sports bras." has a very low ROAS of 1.90

hypotheses.hypothesis: Changing the ad copy for the "Doctors recommend breathable modal — meet our men athletic briefs." creative to focus on comfort instead of doctor recommendations will increase ROAS above 3.
supporting_signals: "Doctors recommend breathable modal — meet our men athletic briefs." has a low ROAS of 1.95.

hypotheses.hypothesis: Duplicating the "Doctors recommend breathable modal — meet our men boxers." creative and targeting a broader audience will result in a similar ROAS of 45+ for the new campaigns.
supporting_signals: "Doctors recommend breathable modal — meet our men boxers." demonstrates high ROAS of 50.91 and CTR of 0.014

hypotheses.hypothesis: Replacing creatives with high impressions and ROAS below 10 with entirely new concepts (different product angle and creative style) will improve overall ROAS by 15%.
supporting_signals: Multiple creatives have high impressions and declining ROAS, indicating creative fatigue.
Refresh ad copy and visuals for creatives with high impressions but ROAS below 10.

hypotheses.hypothesis: Allocating 70% of the budget to the retargeting audience will increase overall ROAS by 10% due to its higher performance.
supporting_signals: Retargeting audience has a significantly higher ROAS (14.40) compared to Broad (8.06) and Lookalike (9.66) audiences.

hypotheses.hypothesis: Increasing Facebook ad spend by 5% while decreasing Instagram ad spend by 5% will improve overall ROAS.
supporting_signals: Facebook has slightly higher ROAS (9.90) than Instagram (9.38)

hypotheses.hypothesis: Launching a new campaign specifically highlighting the comfort and breathability of all men's modal undergarments will result in an average ROAS of 40+.
